title: Bronze bolts (unf)

properties.value: Bronze bolts (unf) are unfinished bolts made from using a bronze bar on an anvil with a hammer, requiring 3 Smithing, yielding 10 bronze bolts (unf) and 12.5 Smithing experience. Using a feather on one makes a bronze bolt, requiring 9 Fletching, and yielding 0.5 Fletching experience per bolt.

Item ID9375

Bronze bolts (unf) are unfinished bolts made from using a bronze bar on an anvil with a hammer, requiring 3 Smithing, yielding 10 bronze bolts (unf) and 12.5 Smithing experience. Using a feather on one makes a bronze bolt, requiring 9 Fletching, and yielding 0.5 Fletching experience per bolt.

[[File:Bronze bolts (unf) detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Bronze bolts (unf)''' are [[unfinished bolt]]s made from using a [[bronze bar]] on an [[anvil]] with a [[hammer]], requiring 3 [[Smithing]], yielding 10 bronze bolts (unf) and 12.5 Smithing [[experience]]. Using a [[feather]] on one makes a [[bronze bolt]], requiring 9 [[Fletching]], and yielding 0.5 Fletching experience per bolt.
